2012400.name: Machinicide Demo
2012400.description:
Machinicide is a fast-paced FPS with bullet-hell influences. Crush all evil robots to scraps with a huge arsenal of futuristic weapons and your ability to change gravity while evading massive amounts of projectiles.

Looter shooter ad absurdum

Who needs to reload when you have a near-endless supply of guns at your disposition. Just throw away your used up guns for cool explosions on impact and pick up new ones.

Turn enemies to Piňatas

Running out of weapons to shoot? Just point your hand on enemies to turn them into more weapons while enjoying a shower of confetti.

SAVES

Saves from demo are compatible with the full game
2012400.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 捷克语, 俄语
